text.0: accept our loudestsounding hymn food most delightful to the gods.
text.1: pouring our offerings in thy mouth.
text.2: now agni will we say to thee o wisest and best aṅgiras.
text.4: who agni is thy kin of men who is thy worthy worshipper.
text.5: on whom dependent who art thou.
text.6: the kinsman agni of mankind their well beloved friend art thou.
text.7: a friend whom friends may supplicate.
text.8: bring to us mitra varuṇa bring the gods to mighty sacrifice.
text.9: bring them o agni to thine home.
